sen.j: 渤海使（ぼっかいし）は渤海 (国)より日本を訪問した使節であり、728年から922年までの間に34回（このほか遼による派遣が1度）の使節が記録に残っている。
sen.e: Bokkaishi was the envoy to Japan from Bokkai Dynasty, and a record stated there were 34 visits (one visit from Liao Dynasty) of the envoy during 728 to 922.
Bokkaishi was the envoy to Japan from Bo Hai, and a record stated there were 34 visits (one visit from the Liao Dynasty) of the envoy during 728 to 922.
sen.cmt: Bokkai Dynasty→Bokkaiは日本語読みのため、Bo Haiに修正、the Lian Dynastyとし、スペース消去
sen.e: Bokkaishi was the envoy to Japan from Bo Hai, and a record stated there were 34 visits (one visit from the Liao Dynasty) of the envoy during 728 to 922.

sen.j: 698年に大祚栄により建国された渤海 (国)であるが、大武芸の時代になると唐や新羅と外交的に対立するようになり、これらの勢力を牽制する目的で日本への遣使が計画された。
sen.e: Bokkai Dynasty was founded by Jo-yeong DAE in 698, but it became opposed to Tang Dynasty and Silla in the period of Bugei DAI, and it was planned to dispatch an envoy to Japan in order to warn against the power.

Bo Hai was founded by Jo-yeong DAE in 698, but it became opposed to the Tang Dynasty and Silla in the period of Muye DAE, and it was planned to dispatch an envoy to Japan in order to warn against the power.
sen.cmt: Bokkai Dynasty→Bo Haiに修正、Bugei DAI→日本語読みのため、Muye DAEとし、the Tang Dynastyとしました。(参考: http://www.balhaekorea.com/heroes02.html)
sen.e: Bo Hai was founded by Jo-yeong DAE in 698, but it became opposed to the Tang Dynasty and Silla in the period of Muye DAE, and it was planned to dispatch an envoy to Japan in order to warn against the power.

sen.j: 初期の段階では軍事同盟としての色彩が強い使節であり、また日本側も渤海が天皇の徳化により来朝したと捉え、使節を非常に厚遇している。
sen.e: The envoy had strong suggestion of military alliance at the initial stage, and Japan side treated the envoy from Bokkai Dynasty very well as Japan viewed it as he/she visited Japan by the emperor's influence by virtue.

The envoy had strong suggestion of military alliance at the initial stage, and Japan side treated the envoy from Bo Hai very well as Japan viewed it as he/she visited Japan by the emperor's influence by virtue.

The envoy had strong suggestion of military alliance at the initial stage, and Japan side treated the envoy from Bo Hai very well as Japan viewed it as he/she visited Japan by the emperor's influence by virtue.

sen.j: しかし大欽茂の時代になり、唐との融和が図られる時代になると軍事的な意味合いは薄れ、もっぱら文化交流と経済活動を中心とした使節へとその性格を変化させていった。
sen.e: However, when it became the period of Kinmo DAI and of reconciliation with Tang, its military implication wore off and changed its characteristics to the envoy for cultural exchange and economic activities.

However, when it became the period of Heummu DAE and of reconciliation with Tang, its military implication wore off and changed its characteristics to the envoy for cultural exchange and economic activities.
sen.cmt: Kinmo DAI→日本語読みのため、Heummu DAEとしました。
sen.e: However, when it became the period of Heummu DAE and of reconciliation with Tang, its military implication wore off and changed its characteristics to the envoy for cultural exchange and economic activities.

sen.j: 特に問題となったのは朝貢貿易の形態を取ったため、渤海からの貢物に対して、日本側では数倍の回賜でもって応える義務が生じ、多大な利益を渤海にもたらした。
sen.e: The problem was that it took the style of tribute trade, so Japan was obligated to return severalfold kaishi (return gift) to correspond to a tribute from Bokkai Dynasty and produced great profit to Bokkai Dynasty.
The problem was that it took the style of tribute trade, so Japan was obligated to return severalfold kaishi (return gift) to correspond to a tribute from Bo Hai and produced great profit to Bo Hai.
The problem was that it took the style of tribute trade, so Japan was obligated to return severalfold kaishi (return gift) to correspond to a tribute from Bo Hai and produced great profit to Bo Hai.

sen.j: 日本側は、朝廷の徴税能力が衰え、使節供応と回賜のための経費が重荷となった後は、使節来朝を12年に1度にするなどの制限を加えたが、その交流は渤海滅亡まで継続した。
sen.e: After tax collection capability by the imperial court diminished and the expenses for entertaining the envoy and kaishi became burden, Japan side added the limitations to have the envoy's visit once in 12 years, but the exchange had continued until the fall of Bokkai Dynasty.

After tax collection capability by the Imperial Court diminished and the expenses for entertaining the envoy and kaishi became burden, Japan side added the limitations to have the envoy's visit once in 12 years, but the exchange had continued until the fall of Bo Hai.
sen.cmt: Bokkai Dynasty→Bo Haiに修正、the Imperial Courtとしました。
sen.e: After tax collection capability by the Imperial Court diminished and the expenses for entertaining the envoy and kaishi became burden, Japan side added the limitations to have the envoy's visit once in 12 years, but the exchange had continued until the fall of Bo Hai.
